note: A little introduction 😊 I have a BA in Microbiology🦠, a BS in Molecular & Cellular Biology🧬, am a Doctor of Pharmacy💊 , with a focus on Infectious Disease in Critical Care🏥 . I have a minor in chemistry🧪, Math♾, & Physics⚛️ , & (almost a BS in) Biochemistry☣️. I designed antimicrobial stewardship programs for high acuity hospitals & was recruited to make software for antimicrobial stewardship implementation. I love science & helping people! NEVER A STUPID QUESTION 🙋‍♀️! I am here to answer 💕
